Package org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.perception

Class PerceptionIndex

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.perception.PerceptionIndex
public class PerceptionIndex extends Object
The PerceptionIndex provides fast spatial access to perception relevant objects, such as vehicles, traffic lights, and building walls. It uses special spatial data structures for efficient querying of nearby entities.

  • Method Details

    • getVehiclesInRange

      public List<VehicleObject> getVehiclesInRange(PerceptionModel perceptionModel)
      Queries the PerceptionIndex and returns all vehicles inside the PerceptionModel.

    • registerVehicleType

      public void registerVehicleType(String vehicleId, VehicleType vehicleType)
      Registers a vehicle and stores its corresponding vehicle type by name. This is required to extract vehicle dimensions.
      Parameters:
      vehicleId - id of the vehicle to register
      vehicleType - the vehicle type of the vehicle

    • removeVehicles

      public void removeVehicles(Iterable<String> vehiclesToRemove)
      Remove all vehicles from the PerceptionIndex by a list of vehicle ids.
      Parameters:
      vehiclesToRemove - the list of vehicles to remove from the index

    • updateVehicles

      public void updateVehicles(Iterable<VehicleData> vehiclesToUpdate)
      Updates the PerceptionIndex with a list of VehicleData objects.
      Parameters:
      vehiclesToUpdate - the list of vehicles to add or update in the index

    • getNumberOfVehicles

      public int getNumberOfVehicles()
      Returns the number of indexed vehicles.
      Returns:
      the number of vehicles

    • getTrafficLightsInRange

      public List<TrafficLightObject> getTrafficLightsInRange(PerceptionModel perceptionModel)
      Queries the PerceptionIndex and returns all traffic lights inside the PerceptionModel.

    • addTrafficLightGroup

      public void addTrafficLightGroup(TrafficLightGroup trafficLightGroup)
      Adds traffic lights to the spatial index, as their positions are static, it is enough to store positional information only once.
      Parameters:
      trafficLightGroup - the registered traffic light group

    • updateTrafficLights

      public void updateTrafficLights(Map<String,TrafficLightGroupInfo> trafficLightsToUpdate)
      Updates the PerceptionIndex in regard to traffic lights. The unit simulator has to be queried as TrafficLightUpdates do not contain all necessary information.
      Parameters:
      trafficLightsToUpdate - a list of information packages transmitted by the traffic simulator

    • getSurroundingWalls

      public Collection<BuildingWall> getSurroundingWalls(PerceptionModel perceptionModel)
